system.effect:
Bigelow’s Befoulment taints all food or drink you desire within a 2m cubed area with harmful bacteria. 
If you spend 5 STA casting this invocation, anyone who consumes the affected food or drink suffers the Disease condition within the next hour. 
While affected by the Disease condition, a target takes a -2 to all actions, lowers their maximum STA by one quarter, and must make DC:14 Endurance checks at the discretion of the Game Master or suffer the Nausea condition. 
The Disease condition can only be removed by having a Doctor roll a DC:15 Healing Hands check on the affected character and then that character getting a full night’s rest. 
If you spend 10 STA casting this invocation, the affected targets also suffer the Poison condition.
